title: World Gold Council Anticipates Flat Performance In ‘Soft Landing’ Scenario
description: The World Gold Council (WGC) is anticipating a flat demand for the precious metal in the expected case of a “soft landing” scenario. However, the institution states that a recession is still not off the table, given that the U.S. Federal Reserve has managed only to pull off two soft landings in nine tightening cycles. […]

title: Binance faces serious allegations in SEC legal battle
description: Binance, the world’s largest crypto exchange, and its former CEO, Changpeng Zhao, are embroiled in a legal tussle with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The SEC’s latest court filings suggest that Binance and Zhao attempted to deliberately sidestep U.S. laws. This accusation comes after a $4.3 billion settlement with the Department of Justice ... Read more
